name: AdamCarer
0:
”Alexa open alzheimer assitant”
”Alexa tell alzheimer assitant train my brain”
”brain training”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: alzheimer assistant
des:
Adam Carer helps people disabled with Alzheimer’s Disease. Disabled people can train their brains every day and simply just by voice. They can select a random training task - for example, remember how many red things are in the image. Adam Carer can also create reminders and remind you to take a pill.

The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
